title: Slug Alias
description: A slug that points to an object primarily identified by another slug.

id.description: This resource's Noid. It's a unique, opaque identifier.

_rev.description: The CouchDB revision string for this document. If it doesn't have one, it has yet to be inserted into CouchDB.

oneOf.description: Number of seconds after the Unix epoch
An ISO 6801 timestamp akin to JSON Schema's `date-time`, but only accepts times in UTC. Note that decimal places after the number of seconds are not allowed.

public.description: If set, the object was made available to the public at this time. If unset, it is not available to the public.

oneOf.description: Number of seconds after the Unix epoch
An ISO 6801 timestamp akin to JSON Schema's `date-time`, but only accepts times in UTC. Note that decimal places after the number of seconds are not allowed.

updated.description: Timestamp for when this object was last updated.

updateInternalmeta.title: Process update
updateInternalmeta.description: Information about the most recent update to the internalmeta database made because of changes to this object.

oneOf.description: Number of seconds after the Unix epoch
An ISO 6801 timestamp akin to JSON Schema's `date-time`, but only accepts times in UTC. Note that decimal places after the number of seconds are not allowed.

requestDate.description: Most recent request time for the automated process to run.

oneOf.description: Number of seconds after the Unix epoch
An ISO 6801 timestamp akin to JSON Schema's `date-time`, but only accepts times in UTC. Note that decimal places after the number of seconds are not allowed.

processDate.description: Most recent time the process update took place.

succeeded.description: Whether the last process was run successfully on this object.

message.description: Error message supplied by the process.

slug.description: Human-readable identifier used to retrieve this object. Any such object without a slug will not be retrievable without access to the object's Noid.

to.description: The Noid of the object this alias points to.
